snippet.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon Announcement Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, PC)
snippet.description:
The prophesied end of the Zemurian continent draws near, and so does the launch of humanity's first foray into space. A sudden invitation from Marduk to cooperate in a high-tech training exercise sets Van Arkride, Ashen Chevalier Rean Schwarzer, and Father Kevin Graham on a collision course with the secrets at the very core of Zemuria.

Their paths may diverge, but the ultimate question remains the same: Just what lies beyond the edge of the horizon? Find out when The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon launches on Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and PC in Fall 2025! 

Follow @NISAmerica on X, Instagram, and Facebook for updates! 
Learn more @ thelegendofheroes.com/horizon/

#TrailsbeyondtheHorizon
